title: Ep. 1005 - Using Racism To Prevent Racism
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEm 

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, the Minneapolis school district instates a policy of laying off white teachers before black teachers. This is supposed to prevent systemic racism. But how do you prevent a thing from happening by doing that very thing? Also, the Democrats double down on their favorite strategy: emotional blackmail. Tragedy strikes CNN, and thus the entire nation. Sam Harris says that sometimes you have to subvert democracy in order to save it. Does that make sense? In our Daily Cancellation, the new feminist She-Hulk show premiers, and it’s about as insufferable as you expect.
